text: Triple Play Baseball '96 is a video game developed by Canadian studio Extended Play and published by EA Sports for the Sega Genesis. ==Gameplay== Triple Play Baseball gives players the option of using an enlarged World Series Baseball view. ==Reception== Next Generation reviewed the Genesis version of the game, rating it three stars out of five, and stated that "Triple Play Baseball is a solid baseball effort, and it ranks right up there with Sega's World Series '95." ==Reviews== *Electronic Gaming Monthly (Jul, 1995) *GamePro (Jul, 1995) *All Game Guide - 1998 *Video Games & Computer Entertainment - Jun, 1995 ==References== Category:1995 video games Category:Baseball video games Category:Sega Genesis games Category:Sega Genesis-only games Category:Video games developed in Canada
title: Triple Play Baseball '96
